item.title: About
item.description: I hold a MSc degree in Computer Science from UNICAMP, where I also completed my undergraduate studies in Computer Engineering. My passion lies in programming and tackling complex problems. Currently, I am employed as a Site Reliability Engineer at Griaule. During my postgraduate studies, I focused on compiler construction and code optimization at UNICAMP. Additionally, my interests extend to parallel computing, computer architecture, high-performance computing systems, and reliability. Previously, I worked as a Intern at the Brazilian Center for Research in Energy and Materials (CNPEM), into the Brazilian Synchrotron Light Laboratory (LNLS) / Sirius, on the Scientific Computing Group (GCC).

item.title: How to create a blog with Hugo, Travis CI and GitHub Pages
